member.name: T:xiApi.NET.TRG_OVERLAP

member.summary: No trigger overlap is permitted. If camera is in read-out phase, all triggers are rejected.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_OVERLAP.READ_OUT
member.summary: Trigger is accepted only when sensor is ready to start next exposure with defined exposure time. Trigger is rejected when sensor is not ready for new exposure with defined exposure time. (see Note1)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.TRG_OVERLAP.PREV_FRAME
member.summary: Trigger is accepted by camera any time. If sensor is not ready for the next exposure - the trigger is latched and sensor starts exposure as soon as exposure can be started with defined exposure time.

member.summary: structure contains frames counter

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.TRANSPORT_SKIPPED_FRAMES
member.summary: Number of skipped frames on transport layer (e.g. when image gets lost while transmission). Occur when capacity of transport channel does not allow to transfer all data.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.API_SKIPPED_FRAMES
member.summary: Number of skipped frames on API layer. Occur when application does not process the images as quick as they are received from the camera.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.TRANSPORT_TRANSFERRED_FRAMES
member.summary: Number of delivered buffers since last acquisition start.

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.FRAME_MISSED_TRIGGER_DUETO_OVERLAP
member.summary: Number of missed triggers overlapped with exposure or read-out stage of previous frame – see XI_PRM_TRG_OVERLAP. (see Note1)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.FRAME_MISSED_TRIGGER_DUETO_FRAME_BUFFER_OVR
member.summary: Number of missed triggers due to frame buffer full. (see Note1)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.FRAME_BUFFER_OVERFLOW
member.summary: Internal camera frame buffer memory (RAM) full events counter. It can be incremented multiple times per one frame. (see Note1)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.COUNTER_SELECTOR.TRANSPORT_QUEUE_UNDERRUN
member.summary: Incremented when camera starts to transfer new image, however no target buffer is queued in the transport queue. Connected to GenTL.STREAM_INFO_NUM_UNDERRUN. (see Note1)

member.name: F:xiApi.NET.SENSOR_FEATURE_SELECTOR.SENSOR_FEATURE_HIGH_CONVERSION_GAIN
member.summary: Enables high conversion gain feature which applies additional gain to the signal at the pixel level. This leads to a reduction in read noise and a boost in sensitivity and signal-to-noise ratio, particularly in low-light situations. Consequently, the camera exhibits superior performance in dark environments, capturing images with minimal noise and enhanced detail.

member.summary: 8 bits per pixel raw data from sensor. [pixel byte] raw data from transport (camera output)

member.summary: 16 bits per pixel raw data from sensor. [pixel byte low] [pixel byte high] 16 bits (depacked) raw data

member.summary: Data from transport layer (e.g. packed). Depends on data on the transport layer (see Note7)

member.summary: RGB16 planar data format

member.name: F:xiApi.XI_IMG_FORMAT.RAW8X4
member.summary: 8 bits per pixel raw data from sensor(4 components in a row). [ch1 pixel byte [ch2 pixel byte] [ch3 pixel byte] [ch4 pixel byte] 8 bits raw data from 4 channels (e.g. sCMOS cameras)

member.name: F:xiApi.XI_IMG_FORMAT.RAW16X2
member.summary: 16 bits per pixel raw data from sensor(2 components in a row). [ch1 pixel byte low] [ch1 pixel byte high] [ch2 pixel byte low] [ch2 pixel byte high] 16 bits (depacked) raw data from 2 channels (e.g. high gain and low gain channels of sCMOS cameras)

member.name: F:xiApi.XI_IMG_FORMAT.RAW16X4
member.summary: 16 bits per pixel raw data from sensor(4 components in a row). [ch1 pixel byte low] [ch1 pixel byte high] [ch2 pixel byte low] [ch2 pixel byte high] [ch3 pixel byte low] [ch3 pixel byte high] [ch4 pixel byte low] [ch4 pixel byte high] 16 bits (depacked) raw data from 4 channels (e.g. sCMOS cameras)

member.name: F:xiApi.XI_IMG_FORMAT.XI_RAW32
member.summary: 32 bits per pixel raw data from sensor in integer format (LSB first). 4 bytes (LSB first) pixel (depacked) raw data

member.name: F:xiApi.XI_IMG_FORMAT.XI_FLOAT32
member.summary: 32 bits per pixel raw data from sensor in single-precision floating point format. 4 bytes per pixel (depacked) raw data
